Horrible. 

The ranked experience is pure hell. At lower level you play with trolls and angry kids everywhere and at a higher level - a sea of cheaters. Turning it into a free-to-play was a terrible idea.

The new updates get more and more cringe, end of round dancing. Player model stance looks cartoony and all of these new characters.. I don't feel the vibe or the need. Like models with aqua suits, wtf?! 

Also, no Aztec map, lol.

Well. I guess there is not much to say. This game is every single compliment you can think off. It is funny, enjoyable and good but also bad, shit and the stupidest game you have ever seen. Depends on your Matches. But this is what makes Counter Strike, Counter Strike. Btw If youre cheating in this game, youre a failure.

I've been hacking and cheating in this game for about 4 hours now in the matchmaking system and i bought prime, not one thing stopped me from aimlocking and walling, this games anti-cheat system is a joke and valve should get more banhappy if they want this game to succeed, seems like valorant will be everyones favourite.

UPDATE: still hacking away for another 28 hours VAC is useless.
